Metadata.title: Quantum Trade Limited - Your Trusted Investment Partner
Metadata.description: Quantum Trade Limited provides innovative investment and advisory solutions to help you achieve your financial goals.

Hero.title: Hungary Guest Investor Residence Program
Hero.subtitle: One of the most affordable residence permit programs in the EU through investment.
Hero.imageAlt: Hero image showing our program in action

Features.title: About Us
Features.subtitle: Learn more about our company, our expert team, and our vision for the future.

feature1.title: About Quantum Trade Limited
feature1.description: Quantum Trade Limited is a leading company in the field of international investment and consulting. Our company aims to help our clients achieve their financial goals by providing innovative and effective solutions. Quantum Trade Limited operates with the principles of reliability, transparency, and customer focus. Our services include investment consulting, asset management, and strategic planning. With our deep knowledge and experience in global financial markets, we create tailored solutions for the diverse needs of our clients. Additionally, we take pride in being the only authorized company for the Hungary Investor Visa program. Through this program, we provide professional support to individuals seeking to obtain a residence permit in Hungary through investment.

feature2.title: Our Team
feature2.description: Behind the success of Quantum Trade Limited is a team of experts and passionate professionals. Our team has extensive knowledge and experience in financial consulting, investment management, and strategic planning. We continuously improve ourselves and closely follow industry innovations to provide the best service to our clients. Our team, driven by a strong team spirit, prioritizes customer satisfaction in every project.

feature3.title: Our Vision
feature3.description: At Quantum Trade Limited, ethical values, sustainability, and customer focus form the foundation of our business approach. Our philosophy aims not only for success but also for making a positive contribution to society and the environment. We strive to establish long-term partnerships through transparent communication and trust-based relationships. At Quantum Trade Limited, we define success not only by financial gains but also by adding value to our clients' lives and helping them achieve their goals.

preview1.title: SPRINT Hungary Real Estate Development and Investment Fund
preview1.description: This fund was approved by the Hungarian Audit Authority on August 15, 2024. The fund is valid for 20 years and can be extended for another 20 years at the discretion of the fund manager. The fund has four different investment classes: A, B, C, and D. The C and D classes are specifically designed for third-country nationals and help them obtain a guest investor visa.
preview1.point1: Approved by the Hungarian Audit Authority
preview1.point2: Valid for 20 years, extendable for another 20
preview1.point3: Helps obtain a guest investor visa

preview2.title: Why Choose Hungary?
preview2.description: Hungary offers numerous advantages for investors and foreign nationals looking for opportunities.
preview2.point1: Access to the EU and Schengen area
preview2.point2: Simplified application process with no minimum stay requirement
preview2.point3: Low corporate tax rate (9% - the lowest in Europe)

preview3.title: Who Can Apply?
preview3.description: To be eligible for the Hungarian Investor Visa, applicants must meet the following criteria.
preview3.point1: Must not be an EU citizen
preview3.point3: Minimum investment of â‚¬250,000 in an approved fund

VisionPreview.title: Our Vision
VisionPreview.description: At Quantum Trade Limited, we aspire to be a global leader in investment and consulting, driven by transparency, reliability, and sustainable growth. Our vision is to create innovative and long-term financial solutions that empower our clients and help them achieve their financial goals.
VisionPreview.point1: Providing innovative and sustainable investment solutions to maximize value for our clients.
VisionPreview.point2: Leveraging technology and financial innovations to make investment processes more efficient and accessible.
VisionPreview.point3: Establishing a trusted consulting platform that enables investors to reach their goals with confidence.
VisionPreview.point4: Building long-term partnerships based on transparency, ethical values, and customer-centric service.
VisionPreview.point5: Facilitating access to economic and social opportunities through special programs such as the Hungary Investor Visa.
